DOC.brief_summary: This study compare bifeprunox currently market medication , Zyprexa ( olanzapine ) , respect affect weight treatment outpatient schizophrenia . The study compare effect medication several variable , include body weight triglyceride level .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Affect Bifeprunox Vs Olanzapine Weight During Treatment Outpatients With Schizophrenia .
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group study bifeprunox treatment outpatient schizophrenia , olanzapine active comparator . Subjects must stable 3 month treatment olanzapine baseline . There 2 treatment arm study , approximately 60 subject per arm . After randomization blinding , subject either remain olanzapine switch bifeprunox . Assessments , include body weight waist measurement , make study visit.Subjects participate study approximately 11 week . After screen period 6 14 day , eligible subject treat 8 week . Subjects enter long-term extension return follow-up visit 7 day discontinue use test article . Subjects enter long-term extension 7-day taper/titration period 8 week double-blind treatment .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Current treatment least 3 month olanzapine . Primary diagnosis schizophrenia . Total Positive Negative Symptoms Scale ( PANSS ) score < =70 screening baseline . Exclusion criterion : Psychiatric diagnosis schizophrenia , assess modify Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) , consider investigator primary psychiatric diagnosis . History presence clinically significant cardiovascular , endocrine , hepatic , renal medical disease might detrimental subject confound study . History suicide attempt within 3 year day 1 significant immediate risk violence suicidality .
